containers

Class Discussion

  • java.lang.Object
    • containers.Discussion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container

    public class Discussion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Container
    The discussion is a Container that interfaces two Agents during an argumentations. The class creates all the variables necessary to lauch and run a successful instance of AMAIL.
    Author:
    kemoadrian

    • Constructor Detail

      • Discussion

        public Discussion(Agreement a,
                  java.lang.String c1,
                  java.lang.String c2,
                  Hypothesis h,
                  boolean initialize)
        Creates a new instance of Discussion
        Parameters:
        a - The kind of Agreement that will be addressed by this Discussion
        c1 - The name of Concept discussed that belongs to the Defenser
        c2 - The name of Concept discussed that belongs to the Attacker
        h - The Hypothesis that will be used to solve the Discussion
        initialize - indicates if the static variables of Discussion should be initialized before the instantiation

      • argumentation

        public void argumentation(Hypothesis h)
        Executing a tentative to solve the current disagreement over the meaning in the scenarios where the solving requires a new Concept.
        Parameters:
        h - the Hypothesis with the Concepts used in this Discussion.
